item.title: Open your sail
item.description: Scott Barry Kaufman is a good man. He’s a cognitive scientist who studies human potential and has taught at Columbia, NYU, and UPenn. He’s also a ginormous optimist so studying the work of fellow humanistic psychologist, Abraham Maslow, was the perfect project for Scott. Scott never met Maslow in person, yet somehow he developed a strong affinity for him. Scott writes in his book, Transcend: The New Science of Self Actualization:
